name: Running Out of Time (range26)
description:
Our Character needs to go to the Time Dimension to rescue his loved ones. But in the time dimension, he only has 60 seconds to find his loved ones. So he needs more time by collecting the clock items to extend his time, but there are also monsters in the time dimension that can reduce his time in the time dimension.

Control:

Space Bar - Jump

Credits:

  • Bertrand Nicholaus (Artist)
  • Gery Gobalindo (SFX and Music)
  • Michael J.W.R. (Designer and Programmer)
  • Rava Fawwaz S. (Designer and Programmer)
  • Raynaldi Timothy J. (Animator)
